\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{multibib}

\newcites{other}{Other References}

\begin{document}

This may be useful \cite{Kilroy:1942}, but this is definately not \citeother{Angle:2003}.

\bibliographystyle{plain}
\bibliography{foo}

\bibliographystyleother{alpha}
\bibliographyother{foo}

\end{document}
